short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension lets you search for videos in youtube playlists

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Lets you search inside any YouTube playlist.

To use, click the icon when on a YouTube playlist URL. It will load all the videos in the playlist and show a search bar. Once loaded, you can click on an item in the list to instantly jump to it.

1. It's not possible to search for private videos.
2. Not possible to search in private playlists.
3. Not possible to search in "watch later" lists.
4. Not possible to search in "history" lists.
